DOC.brief_summary: This Phase IIb exploratory study design determine whether AFQ056 safe effective whether increase therapeutic window L-dopa patient whose control Parkinson 's Disease symptom limit development dyskinesia induce use L-dopa .
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Safety AFQ056 When Combined With Increased Doses L-dopa Parkinson 's Disease Patients With Moderate-severe L-dopa Induced Dyskinesia
